articles.content:
Twitch is banning the popular emote PogChamp after Ryan Gutierrez, the man depicted in the emote, tweeted in support of the rioters on Capitol Hill.
Guiterrez, better known as Gootecks, tweeted will… [+1748 chars]

articles.author: Michael Billington
articles.title: Robot wars: 100 years on, it's time to reboot Karel Čapek's RUR - The Guardian
articles.description: The play Rossum’s Universal Robots clearly belongs to the 1920s but its satirical take on the meeting of humans and machines is all too relevant today
articles.content: Not many plays introduce a new word to the language. One that did was Karel apeks RUR: Rossums Universal Robots that had its premiere in Prague 100 years ago this month. Every time we use the word ro… [+3123 chars]
